trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class defines the recipient of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> define el destinatario de un mensaje CMS/PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: Constructs an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Genera una instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que representa el certificado del destinatario.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> constructor constructs an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class by using the specified recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: El constructor de <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> crea una instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> utilizando el certificado de destinatario especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient> class has the following default property values.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient> clase tiene los siguientes valores de propiedad predeterminados.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: Se ha pasado una referencia nula a un método que no la acepta como argumento válido.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: No se pudo finalizar una operación criptográfica.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Miembro de la enumeración <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> que especifica el tipo del identificador de destinatario.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que representa el certificado del destinatario.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> constructor constructs an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class by using the specified recipient identifier type and recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: El constructor <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> crea una instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> utilizando el tipo de identificador de destinatario y certificado de destinatario especificados.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: Se ha pasado una referencia nula a un método que no la acepta como argumento válido.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: No se pudo finalizar una operación criptográfica.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.Certificate" /> property retrieves the certificate associated with the recipient.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.Certificate" /> recupera el certificado asociado al destinatario.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that holds the certificate associated with the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que contiene el certificado asociado al destinatario.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.RecipientIdentifierType" /> property retrieves the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.RecipientIdentifierType" /> recupera el tipo del identificador de destinatario.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Miembro de la enumeración <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> que especifica el tipo del identificador de destinatario.
